alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau, north central Clay, Duval and southeastern Camden Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Kings Ferry to near Cisco Gardens to Orange Park. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Orange Park, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Unf, Kings Bay Base and Mandarin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
